attributes.action: Give Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, 10% of London's 'G.D.P.' + ALL of its own 'G.D.P.'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I 'd like: Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, to be supported/allowed/enabled, to: compete/even 'catch -up'/vice -versa, with England.  10% of London's 'G.D.P.', to each Nation + IRELAND, too!!  + Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, to: keep all of their 'G.D.P's.'.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
